channel.title: Social project on Hugo Apéro
channel.description: Recent content in Social project on Hugo Apéro

item.title: Kolekti
item.description: This project was developed as the result of the Innovation challenge For more data on labor informality hackaton, organized by Datalat, PNUD Ecuador, UN Women Ecuador, and the International Labour Organization. The hackaton The Innovation challenge For more data on labor informality hackaton searched for a technological solution to collect labor informality data in Ecuador. In the first stage of this challenge, there were 39 proposals from 80 interdisciplinary teams.
